name: A Fool's Destiny
description:
In the world of Tarot, where everything is ruled by a wicked fortune teller, it is widely known, that only a fool would dare to defy her will. You are that fool! 

As the only one of her subjects who is willing to stand against her tyranny, you will have to collect all the cards scattered around the world, in order to escape. 

This however, will not come easy, as they tend to be guarded by the minions of your opressor.

Controls

Keyboard:      AD to Move     W/Space to Jump      Left Mouse to Attack

Gamepad:      Control Stick to Move      Lower Button to jump      Left Button to Attack

This game was made as part of the htk game jam - ice edition2021.
